title: Trees shall be planted taking care that they shall not obstruct the maneuvering of firefighting vehicles during an emergency
clause_text: Trees shall be planted taking care that they shall not obstruct the maneuvering of firefighting vehicles during an emergency. In between the trees planted along the boundary of plot, shrubs with grass shall be planted.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Trees shall be planted taking care that they shall not obstruct the maneuvering of firefighting vehicles during an emergency.
